languages.text: "Однако не это хуже всего..." {n}Сенешаль умолкает, когда свет в очередной раз тухнет и вспыхивает.{/n} "Эти перепады и тряска — очень дурные знаки. Знаки того, что {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатор{/g} и Главный кормчий испытывают сложности при трансляции корабля из варпа в реальный мир. В худшем случае — они уже потеряли контроль над процессом, и нам всем остаются считанные мгновения. В лучшем... возможно, если нам удастся добраться до Святилища Навигатора и разобраться, в чем дело, кто-то на судне уцелеет".

traits.locale_text: "Однако не это хуже всего..." {n}Сенешель умолкает, когда свет в очередной раз тухнет и вспыхивает.{/n} "Эти перепады и тряска — очень дурные знаки. Знаки того, что {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатор{/g} и главный кормчий испытывают сложности при трансляции корабля из варпа в реальный мир. В худшем случае — они уже потеряли контроль над процессом, и нам всем остаются считанные мгновения. В лучшем... возможно, если нам удастся добраться до святилища Навигатора и разобраться, в чем дело, кто-то на судне уцелеет".

languages.text: "But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. I fear that they may have already lost control. We must reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation. If we can manage that, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."
languages.original_text: "Однако не это хуже всего..." {n}Сенешаль умолкает, когда свет в очередной раз тухнет и вспыхивает.{/n} "Эти перепады и тряска — очень дурные знаки. Знаки того, что {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатор{/g} и Главный кормчий испытывают сложности при трансляции корабля из варпа в реальный мир. В худшем случае — они уже потеряли контроль над процессом, и нам всем остаются считанные мгновения. В лучшем... возможно, если нам удастся добраться до Святилища Навигатора и разобраться, в чем дело, кто-то на судне уцелеет".

traits.locale_text: "But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. In the worst case, they have already lost control of the process and we all have precious few moments left to live. In the best case... if we manage to reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

"But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. In the worst case, they have already lost control of the process and we all have precious few moments left to live. In the best case... if we manage to reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

"But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. In the worst case, they have already lost control of the process and we all have precious few moments left to live. In the best case... if we manage to reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

"But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. In the worst case, they have already lost control of the process and we all have precious few moments left to live. In the best case... if we manage to reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

"But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. I fear that they may have already lost control. We must reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation. If we can manage that, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

languages.text: “而且，这还不是最麻烦的问题……”{n}灯光忽明忽灭，阿贝拉德顿了顿。{/n}“目前，这艘船颠簸和摇晃的情况令人感到相当不安。这样的迹象表明，{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}与舵手长目前没有办法将飞船从亚空间跃迁到真实世界，我担心他们已经没办法控制这艘船了。我们必须想办法抵达导航者圣所，想办法将情况控制住。如果我们能成功的话，船上的一部分人说不定能活下来。”
languages.original_text: "But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. I fear that they may have already lost control. We must reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation. If we can manage that, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

traits.locale_text: “而且，这还不是最麻烦的问题……”{n}灯光忽明忽灭，阿贝拉德顿了顿。{/n}“目前，这艘船颠簸和摇晃的情况令人感到相当不安。这样的迹象表明，{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}与舵手长目前没有办法将飞船从亚空间跃迁到真实世界。如果是最糟糕的情况，这艘船恐怕已经没办法返回真实世界了，我们的生命恐怕也已经所剩无几。如果是最好的情况……如果我们能想办法抵达导航者圣所，将情况控制住的话，船上的一部分人说不定能活下来。”

languages.text: «Pero eso no es lo peor de todo...». {n}Hace una pausa cuando las luces vuelven a parpadear.{/n} «Todas estas sacudidas y temblores son alarmantes. Son prueba de que el {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} y el maestro timonel tienen dificultades para realizar la transición de la disformidad al espacio real. Me temo que ya han perdido el control del proceso. Debemos llegar al sanctum de navegantes y hacernos cargo de la situación. Si lo logramos es posible que sobreviva alguien en la nave».
languages.original_text: "But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. I fear that they may have already lost control. We must reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation. If we can manage that, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

traits.locale_text: «Pero eso no es lo peor de todo...». {n}Hace una pausa cuando las luces vuelven a parpadear.{/n} «Todas estas sacudidas y temblores son alarmantes. Son prueba de que el {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g} y el maestro timonel tienen dificultades para realizar la transición de la disformidad al espacio real. En el peor de los casos, ya han perdido el control del proceso y solo nos quedan unos instantes de vida. En el mejor de los casos... si conseguimos llegar al sanctum de navegantes y hacernos cargo de la situación, algunos de los tripulantes de la nave pueden sobrevivir».

languages.text: 「しかし、これが最悪の状況ではありません…」{n}電灯が再び点滅し、彼は口をつぐむ。{/n}「この衝撃と揺れこそ一番警戒しなくてはならないものです。これらは、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}とマスター・ヘルムスマンが船を<歪み>からリアルスペースに移動させるのに手こずっている兆候で、もしかしたら、すでに制御を失っているかもしれません。どうにか航宙士のサンクトゥムに到達して、状況を把握しなければなりません。それができれば、この船に乗っている者のうち数人は生き残れるかもしれないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. I fear that they may have already lost control. We must reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation. If we can manage that, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、これが一番悪いわけではない…」{n}電灯が再び点滅し、彼は口をつぐむ。{/n}「この衝撃と揺れこそ一番警戒しなくてはならないものだ。これらは、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}と主舵手が船を〈歪み〉からリアルスペースに移動させるのに手こずっている兆候だ。最悪の場合、すでにプロセスの制御を失い、私たち全員に残された貴重な時間はわずかだ。最善の場合でも…航宙士のサンクトゥムに到達できて、状況に対処できれば、この船に乗っている人の数人は生き残れるかもしれない」

「しかし、これが最悪の状況ではありません…」{n}電灯が再び点滅し、彼は口をつぐむ。{/n}「この衝撃と揺れこそ一番警戒しなくてはならないものです。これらは、{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}とマスター・ヘルムスマンが船を<歪み>からリアルスペースに移動させるのに手こずっている兆候で、もしかしたら、すでに制御を失っているかもしれません。どうにか航宙士のサンクトゥムに到達して、状況を把握しなければなりません。それができれば、この船に乗っている者のうち数人は生き残れるかもしれないでしょう」

languages.text: « Mais ce n'est même pas le pire, {n}dit-il avant de s'interrompre lorsque la lumière clignote à nouveau.{/n} Le plus inquiétant, ce sont tous ces soubresauts et ces secousses. C'est le signe que le {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} et le maître timonier ont du mal à faire transitionner le vaisseau du Warp vers l'espace réel. Je crains qu'ils n'aient d'ores et déjà perdu le contrôle. Nous devons atteindre le sanctum de navigation et reprendre les choses en main. Si nous y parvenons, une partie des passagers de ce vaisseau survivra peut-être. »
languages.original_text: "But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. I fear that they may have already lost control. We must reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation. If we can manage that, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

traits.locale_text: « Mais ce n'est même pas le pire... » {n}Il s'interrompt lorsque la lumière clignote à nouveau.{/n} « Le plus inquiétant, ce sont tous ces soubresauts et ces secousses. C'est le signe que le {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigateur{/g} et le maître timonier ont du mal à transitionner le vaisseau du Warp à l'espace réel. Dans le pire des cas, ils ont déjà perdu le contrôle et il ne nous reste que quelques précieux instants à vivre. Et dans le meilleur des cas... si nous parvenons à atteindre le sanctum de navigation et à reprendre la situation en main, une partie des personnes à bord de ce vaisseau survivra peut-être. »

languages.text: "Aber das ist noch nicht das Schlimmste ..." {n}Er macht eine Pause, als das Licht erneut flackert.{/n} "All diese Erschütterungen sind überaus alarmierend. Sie sind Anzeichen, dass der {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} und der Hauptsteuermann Probleme haben, das Schiff aus dem Warp in den Realraum zu bringen. Ich fürchte, sie haben die Kontrolle verloren. Wir müssen zum Navigator-Sanctum und die Lage in den Griff bekommen. Wenn uns das gelingt, könnten einige auf diesem Schiff überleben."
languages.original_text: "But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. I fear that they may have already lost control. We must reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation. If we can manage that, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

traits.locale_text: "Aber das ist noch nicht das Schlimmste ..." {n}Er macht eine Pause, als das Licht erneut flackert.{/n} "Alle diese Erschütterungen sind überaus alarmierend. Sie sind Anzeichen, dass der {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} und der Hauptsteuermann Probleme haben, das Schiff aus dem Warp in den Realraum zu bringen. Im schlimmsten Fall haben sie bereits die Kontrolle verloren, und wir haben nur noch herzlich wenige Minuten zu leben. Im besten Fall ... erreichen wir das Navigator-Sanctum und bekommen die Lage in den Griff, dann überleben vielleicht doch einige an Bord."

languages.original_text: "But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the Navigator and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. I fear that they may have already lost control. We must reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation. If we can manage that, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

languages.text: "Ama en kötüsü bu da değil..." {n}Işıklar bir kez daha titreşirken bir anlığına duraksıyor.{/n} "Tüm bu şok dalgaları ve sarsıntılar çok endişe verici. {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} ve Başserdümen'in gemiyi öteboyuttan gerçekuzaya geçirmekte zorluk yaşadıklarının işaretleri. Kontrolü kaybetmiş olmalarından korkuyorum. Rotacı'nın Kutağı'na gitmeli ve duruma müdahale etmeliyiz. Başarabilirsek gemideki canlardan bazılarını kurtarabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "But that is not the worst of it all..." {n}He pauses when the light flickers yet again.{/n} "All these jolts and shaking are most alarming. These are signs that the {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g} and the Master Helmsman are having difficulty translating the ship out of the warp and into realspace. I fear that they may have already lost control. We must reach the Navigator's Sanctum and get a handle on the situation. If we can manage that, some aboard this vessel may yet survive."

traits.locale_text: "Ama en kötüsü bu da değil..." {n}Işıklar bir kez daha titreşirken bir anlığına duraksıyor.{/n} "Tüm bu şok dalgaları ve sarsıntılar çok endişe verici. {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g} ve Başserdümen'in gemiyi öteboyuttan gerçekuzaya geçirmekte zorluk yaşadıklarının işaretleri. Kontrolü kaybetmiş olmalarından korkuyorum. Rotacı'nın Kutağı'na gitmeli ve duruma müdahale etmeliyiz. Başarabilirsek gemideki canlardan bazılarını kurtarabiliriz."
